short: MLOps (Machine Learning Ops) & Full Stack Engineer, Supertype.ai
long: Starting his journey with statistics, Calvin is a proud and passionate data-driven engineer working for Supertype. Taking advantages of his mathematical and statistical knowledges, Calvin has been designing and implementing various cases of end-to-end machine learning pipelines tailored to Supertype's clients' business needs. Aside from that, Calvin has had lots of experiences working as a UI/UX designer, allowing him to gain a high level of empathy when assessing business problems and ensuring clients' pain points are always fulfilled in every solutions he delivers.

affiliations.title: Supertype
description: Works on consultation projects for clients with various business domains, including but not limited to the fields of data science, machine learning, and web development
Contributes in both the research and development for Supertype's in-house products, such as Summary: an automatic report generator which gives in-depth analytics of a given mobile application
Helps the companies in its business operations

affiliations.title: University of Pennsylvania
description: Learned MERN stack for web development, producing a 'Reddit-styled' social networking web application as the course output
Learned Stochastic Processes, Microeconomics, and Calculus

affiliations.title: Apple Developer Academy @BINUS
description: Learned and developed iOS applications, 2 of which have been published to the app store
Learned and implemented project management and software development lifecycle
